text: President Trump says he's taking an

could cause heart problems mr. Trump's
also renewed his attack on the World
Health Organization over its response to
the initial outbreak in China in a
letter he said he might make the
temporary freeze of u.s. funding of the
w-h-o permanent if it didn't reform
